$$
X \sim Ber(p) \Rightarrow P(X = 1) = p, P(X = 0) = 1 - p
$$

$$
P(X = x) = p^x (1 - p)^{1 - x}
$$


$$
P(X = 1) = p^1 (1 - p)^{1 - 1} = p
$$
$$
P(X = 0) = p^0 (1 - p)^{1 - 0} = (1 - p)
$$

$$
f_X(x) = P(X = x)
$$

$$
f_X(x) = \begin{cases}
1/4 & \text{si } x = 0,\\
1/2 & \text{si } x = 1,\\
1/4 & \text{si } x = 2,\\
0  & \text{en otro caso}
\end{cases}
$$

$$
F_X(x) = P(X \leq  x)
$$

$$
F_X(x) = \begin{cases}
0 & \text{si } x < 0,\\
1/4 & \text{si } 0 \leq x < 1,\\
3/4 & \text{si } 1 \leq x < 2,\\
1 & \text{si } x \geq 2\\
\end{cases}
$$

$$
\mathbb{E}(X) = \sum_{x} x f_X(x) = 0 \cdot 1/4 + 1 \cdot 1/2 + 2 \cdot 1/4 = 1
$$

$$
\mathbb{E}(X) = \int_{x} x f_X(x)
$$
